descriptionHtml:
Hello!

"Men of Skyrim" is a replacer for 6 male followers/companions. It is NOT exactly lore friendly with some hairstyles and makeup. :)

The followers:
Erik the Slayer - Rorikstead
Vilkas - Whiterun
Farkas - Whiterun
Vorstag - Markarth
Faendal - Riverwood
Marcurio - Riften

REQUIRED MODS: (YOU MUST INSTALL THESE OR THE MOD WILL NOT WORK!)
Apachii Sky Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Oblivion Hair Pack AIO: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598/
ENSE - Eye colors with New Style Eyelashes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12732/

PLEASE NOTE THAT NEW STYLE EYES (ENSE) IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE ON THE NEXUS FOR WHATEVER REASON. I HAVE INCLUDED IT ON THE FILE PAGE. PUT THE ESM FILE IN YOUR DATA FOLDER AND DRAG AND DROP THE NEWEYES FOLDER (TEXTURES) INTO THE TEXTURE FOLDER (INSIDE THE DATA FOLDER) HOPEFULLY THIS HELPS!

IN THE FUTURE I WILL HAVE A SECOND VERSION THAT WILL RUN OFF OF EYES OF BEAUTY.

RECOMMENDED MODS: (mods I <3 love)
Better Males: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/
Hair Packs of TES IV Oblivion: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/
The eyes of beauty: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722/

INSTALLATION:
Drag and drop the files: menofskyrim.bsa, menofskyrim.esp, menofskyrim.bsl into your Data folder. Typically, this folder is found as follows:
C://Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data
**Make sure "Men of Skyrim" is after the other mods in the load order in your NMM**

REMEMBER - IF YOU DON'T LIKE THE LOOK OF THESE CHARACTERS, YOU DON'T HAVE TO INSTALL THE MOD! HELPFUL COMMENTS ARE WELCOME (CRASHES, BUGS, ETC) BUT NEGATIVE COMMENTS DON'T HELP.

Credits:
Apachii Sky Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Oblivion Hair Pack AIO: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598/
Hair Packs of TES IV Oblivion: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/
ENSE - Eye colors with New Style Eyelashes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12732/

And of course - Bethesda <3
author: Kaolinite77
